column2: an A.M. Eatery////I ordered the Breakfast Pot Pie and it was party in your mouth deliciousness. This tastes just like your traditional pot pie
column3: with a generous amount of crust - which
column5: is THE best part. The flavors did not lack at all
column6: fully encompassing your mouth with every bite. The hash browns that came on the side were your typical delicious hash browns
column7: nothing real special but they were definitely real delicious.
